plan(1,init, sentence(true,move( switchplan(attesa) ),'','' ))
plan(2,init, sentence(true,move(actorOp(initSonar)),'','' ))
plan(1,attesa, sentence(true,senseEvent(600000,"cmd","continue"),'','' ))
plan(2,attesa, sentence(true,eventswitch(cmd, Â»cmd( start), move(print(start)) ),'','' ))
plan(3,attesa, sentence(true,move(resumeplan),'','' ))
